title: Who should be considered as the second best band of all time? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Who. 2 hour long sets, huge stadium shows, 100 watt amps, insane volume levels, destruction of instruments, and more are all elements of rock’s peak era. All these can be traced back to The Who. Only The Beatles, the greatest band ever, have had a bigger influence. So much of what Hendrix and Zeppelin did was taken from The Who. Hendrix and Zeppelin were better at it. The Who has the greatest bass player ever and maybe the second or 3rd best drummer.

I suggest a TIE ~Beatles/Stones (Beatles out & out SUCK & Stones are Palatable) Rather than disqualify the question for being Vague I give an answer based on cultural recognizability & influence ~ The First being Pink Floyd ... Now my favorite won't even chart (But) RUSH 2112 ... So overlooked !!
